snippet: LEAD: Like many of the proud sons and daughters of Palermo, Naples and Genoa, Dominic Troncale is not shy about advertising his ethnic heritage. He wears a shirt that says ''Full-Blooded Italian.''...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Like many of the proud sons and daughters of Palermo, Naples and Genoa, Dominic Troncale is not shy about advertising his ethnic heritage. He wears a shirt that says ''Full-Blooded Italian.''

headline.main: San Francisco Journal;   A License Plate Debate: Italian Slurs or Pride?
